metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000344 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the DHIESimplementation allowed the use of ECB mode. This mode is regarded as unsafeand support for it has been removed from the provider.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
